text: the Chinese President Xi Jingping says

well the virus has now killed more than

in his government's efforts to contain
the disease
he said the epidemic is a demon and we

is to substantially reduce the flow of

the number of commuters must be reduced

confirming it's not a total surprise
confirming anecdotally that you can have

in the German case that there was
somebody who was over visiting

yes I mean one of the consequences if
